events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it has not arrived yet. The tracking information hasn't updated for several days.
The system categorized the customer issue under Delivery Delay based on message content mentioning late shipment and tracking delays.
Case assigned to delivery support agent John D. for further investigation of the delayed shipment.
Hello, thank you for contacting us about your order. Iâ€™m here to help you track down the status of your shipment.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check with our courier service?
My order number is 987654321 and the delivery address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
We contacted the shipping company and were informed there was an unexpected delay due to bad weather. Your package should arrive within 3 days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you checking on this and hope it arrives soon.
We will monitor the delivery and follow up if there are any further issues. Please contact us if you do not receive your order within the next three days.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your order and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As we have not received any further communication and your delivery is confirmed, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
